wikipedia_page.main: John Hadfield Bennett (11 August 1885 – 25 May 1973) was an English field hockey player from Chorlton, Lancashire, who competed in the 1920 Summer Olympics.He was a member of the British field hockey team, which won the gold medal.  He also played cricket for Berkshire in the Minor Counties Championship from 1906 to 1908. His brother George played cricket at first-class level.
